jobDescription: Sauce Labs provides the worlds largest cloud-based platform for the automated testing of web and mobile applications. Our customers are household names like Walmart, Salesforce, Visa, Yelp, and NBC. The Sauce Labs Data Science team has been chartered to solve some really difficult problems that our customers face.  Were looking for a Data Scientist to do Data Science, not dashboards. This is not a typical BI position - were essential to the future direction of our products and our company. We have a unique, challenging dataset, built from several years of running over 1.5 billion tests on our platform.  As a Data Scientist at Sauce Labs, you will be turning that dataset into actionable, customer facing products that help developers test their applications more effectively. Our small team is looking for someone who can come up with and test research ideas quickly and accurately, all while keeping a focus on eventual product implementation. You have the opportunity to have a huge impact and help shape the direction of research at Sauce.
